source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_hedgerow_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_hedgerow_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_hedgerow_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.HedgerowID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                             AS HedgerowID,
    T1.category                                     AS Category,
    T1.type                                         AS Type,
    T1.procedure                                    AS Procedure,
    T1.lpa_code                                     AS LPACode,
    T1.lpa_name                                     AS LPAName,
    T10.LPAID                                       AS LPAID,
    T1.appeal_reference_number                      AS AppealRefNumber,
    concat('APP/HGW/',T1.appeal_reference_number)   AS CaseReference,
    T1.rejected_or_withdrawn                        AS RejectedOrWithdrawn,
    T1.appeal_withdrawn_date                        AS AppealWithdrawnDate,
    T1.visit_type                                   AS VisitType,
    T1.appellant                                    AS Appellant,
    T1.site_address_postcode                        AS SiteAddressPostcode,
    T1.revieved_date                                AS ReviewedDate,
    T1.valid_date                                   AS ValidDate,
    T1.start_date                                   AS StartDate,
    T1.event_date                                   AS EventDate,
    T1.decision_date                                AS DecisionDate,
    T1.decision                                     AS Decision,
    T1.open_or_closed                               AS OpenOrClosed,
    T1.linked                                       AS Linked,
    T1.case_officer_name                            AS CaseOfficerName,
    T1.case_officer_login                           AS CaseOfficerLogin,
    T1.processing_state                             AS ProcessingState,
    T2.SourceSystemID                               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)                  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.category,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.type,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpa_code,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.lpa_name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appeal_reference_number,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.rejected_or_withdrawn,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appeal_withdrawn_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.appellant,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.site_address_postcode,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.revieved_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.valid_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.start_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decision_date,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.decision,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.open_or_closed,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.linked,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.case_officer_name,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.case_officer_login,'.'),
            IFNULL(T1.processing_state,'.')
        ))                                          AS RowID,  -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y'                                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_hedgerow T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_local_planning_authority_fact T10 ON t10.LPACode = t1.lpa_code AND T10.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim T3 ON T1.appeal_reference_number = T3.AppealRefNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
    CASE
        WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number = T3.AppealRefNumber AND 
            md5(
                concat(
                    IFNULL(T1.category,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.type,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa_code,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.lpa_name,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.appeal_reference_number,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.rejected_or_withdrawn,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.appeal_withdrawn_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.appellant,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.site_address_postcode,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.revieved_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.valid_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.start_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.decision_date,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.decision,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.open_or_closed,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.linked,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.case_officer_name,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.case_officer_login,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.processing_state,'.')
                )) <> T3.RowID  -- same record, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new record
                THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y'
    AND T1.appeal_reference_number IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.vw_hedgerow)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
Select 
    HedgerowID,
    Category,
    Type,
    Procedure,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    LPAID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    RejectedOrWithdrawn,
    AppealWithdrawnDate,
    VisitType,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddressPostcode,
    ReviewedDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    EventDate,
    DecisionDate,
    Decision,
    OpenOrClosed,
    Linked,
    CaseOfficerName,
    CaseOfficerLogin,
    ProcessingState,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_hedgerow_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    HedgerowID,
    Category,
    Type,
    Procedure,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    LPAID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    RejectedOrWithdrawn,
    AppealWithdrawnDate,
    VisitType,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddressPostcode,
    ReviewedDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    EventDate,
    DecisionDate,
    Decision,
    OpenOrClosed,
    Linked,
    CaseOfficerName,
    CaseOfficerLogin,
    ProcessingState,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim
WHERE AppealRefNumber IN (SELECT AppealRefNumber FROM casework_hedgerow_dim_new WHERE HedgerowID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM casework_hedgerow_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    HedgerowID,
    Category,
    Type,
    Procedure,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    LPAID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    RejectedOrWithdrawn,
    AppealWithdrawnDate,
    VisitType,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddressPostcode,
    ReviewedDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    EventDate,
    DecisionDate,
    Decision,
    OpenOrClosed,
    Linked,
    CaseOfficerName,
    CaseOfficerLogin,
    ProcessingState,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim AS Target
USING casework_hedgerow_dim_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.HedgerowID = Target.HedgerowID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows

WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (
        HedgerowID,
        Category,
        Type,
        Procedure,
        LPACode,
        LPAName,
        LPAID,
        AppealRefNumber,
        CaseReference,
        RejectedOrWithdrawn,
        AppealWithdrawnDate,
        VisitType,
        Appellant,
        SiteAddressPostcode,
        ReviewedDate,
        ValidDate,
        StartDate,
        EventDate,
        DecisionDate,
        Decision,
        OpenOrClosed,
        Linked,
        CaseOfficerName,
        CaseOfficerLogin,
        ProcessingState,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)
    VALUES (
        Source.HedgerowID,
        Source.Category,
        Source.Type,
        Source.Procedure,
        Source.LPACode,
        Source.LPAName,
        Source.LPAID,
        Source.AppealRefNumber,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.RejectedOrWithdrawn,
        Source.AppealWithdrawnDate,
        Source.VisitType,
        Source.Appellant,
        Source.SiteAddressPostcode,
        Source.ReviewedDate,
        Source.ValidDate,
        Source.StartDate,
        Source.EventDate,
        Source.DecisionDate,
        Source.Decision,
        Source.OpenOrClosed,
        Source.Linked,
        Source.CaseOfficerName,
        Source.CaseOfficerLogin,
        Source.ProcessingState,
        Source.SourceSystemID,
        Source.IngestionDate,
        Source.ValidTo,
        Source.RowID,
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_hedgerow_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HedgerowID NULLS LAST) AS HedgerowID,
    Category,
    Type,
    Procedure,
    LPACode,
    LPAName,
    LPAID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    RejectedOrWithdrawn,
    AppealWithdrawnDate,
    VisitType,
    Appellant,
    SiteAddressPostcode,
    ReviewedDate,
    ValidDate,
    StartDate,
    EventDate,
    DecisionDate,
    Decision,
    OpenOrClosed,
    Linked,
    CaseOfficerName,
    CaseOfficerLogin,
    ProcessingState,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_hedgerow_dim;
